"What do you want? I've got nothing usef: "You show up a lot, don't you? You're always hanging around. Not that I care or anything."
"I was told that when you're not sure what to do you should go talk to someone about it. Anyone will do. Try that if you're in a fix."
"Don't always believe what you hear, no matter how credible it may seem. Truth is what you see with your own eyes."
"You should always try to keep a cool head, even if what you see makes your skin crawl."
